EmailTemplate.description: Application denied email for no-FICO customers
EmailTemplate.name: Credit Denied - No FICO product
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry, we were unable to approve your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent BlueWave Community Solar application - unfortunately we're unable to approve your application at this time. Please contact your sales representative to identify why your application was not accepted and next steps.
Thank you for considering BlueWave, we hope to be able to serve you in the future.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
